samples.instruction: En Bank Account-la irundhu OTP illaama panam poyiduchu. Cyber fraud-ku enna seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
Immediately (Minutes matter!):
1. Call Bank - Freeze account, raise dispute
2. cybercrime.gov.in - File complaint online
3. 1930 Helpline - National Cyber Crime (24x7)

Within 24 hours:
4. Written Bank Complaint - Get acknowledgment
5. Police FIR - With all details + screenshots

Bank Liability (RBI Rules):
6. Report within 3 days â†’ Full refund
7. 4-7 days â†’ Max loss â‚¹10,000
8. Bank must resolve in 90 days

Escalation:
9. Banking Ombudsman - cms.rbi.org.in

Prevention:
10. Enable SMS alerts, set transaction limits
11. Never share OTP

**Vehicle Fitness Certificate:**

**à®à®ªà¯à®ªà¯‹à®¤à¯ à®¤à¯‡à®µà¯ˆ?**
- Private Vehicle: 15 à®µà®°à¯à®Ÿà®¤à¯à®¤à®¿à®±à¯à®•à¯ à®ªà®¿à®©à¯ (every 5 years)

**Online Application:**

**CMWSSB (Chennai Metro Water) - New Connection:**

**Online Application:**
1. Website: chennaimetrowater.tn.gov.in
2. Online Services â†’ New Connection
3. Register / Login
4. Fill application
5. Upload documents
6. Pay fee online

**Offline Application:**
- Area Engineer Office
- CMWSSB Head Office

**Documents Required:**
- Property document (Patta / Sale Deed)
- Building Approval Plan
- Property Tax Receipt
- Aadhaar Card
- Passport Photo
- Existing water bill (if any)

**Types of Connection:**

| Type | Monthly Charge |
|------|---------------|
| Domestic | â‚¹70-400 (based on usage) |
| Commercial | Higher rates |
| Industrial | Highest |

**Process:**

**Step 1:** Application Submit

**Step 2:** Site Inspection
- Feasibility check
- Pipeline proximity
- Road cutting requirement

**Step 3:** Estimate
- Connection charge
- Road cutting charge (if any)
- Deposit

**Approximate Costs:**
| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Connection Charge | â‚¹500-2,000 |
| Security Deposit | â‚¹500-1,000 |
| Road Cutting | â‚¹5,000-20,000 (if needed) |

**Step 4:** Payment

**Step 5:** Connection
- Time: 15-30 days (normal)
- Road cutting: 1-2 months

**No Water Supply Area:**

- Borewell permission from CMWSSB

**Complaints:**
- Helpline: 044-4567 4567
- App: CMWSSB Mobile App

- Delay penalty applies

samples.instruction: Voter ID - New registration, address change, name correction - full process?
samples.current_output:
New Registration:

Eligibility: Indian citizen, 18 years on Jan 1 (qualifying date), Ordinary resident

Apply Online:
1. voters.eci.gov.in OR Voter Helpline App
2. 'New Voter Registration' â†’ Form 6
3. Fill: Personal info, Address (where you want to vote), Family/Neighbor reference (existing voter)
4. Upload: Age proof, Address proof, Passport photo
5. Submit

Verification: BLO (Booth Level Officer) visit â†’ Verify residence â†’ May ask neighbors (2-4 weeks)

Collection: SMS notification â†’ Download e-EPIC (Voter Helpline App) â†’ Physical card from BLO/Election Office

Address Change (Within State):
1. voters.eci.gov.in â†’ Form 6 (new address)
2. Upload new address proof
3. BLO verification â†’ Old entry deleted automatically

Address Change (Different State):
- Apply Form 6 in new state â†’ Added to new constituency â†’ Deleted from old automatically

Name/DOB/Photo Correction:
1. voters.eci.gov.in â†’ Form 8
2. Select correction type
3. Upload supporting document
4. Submit â†’ Correction in 15-30 days

Delete Entry (Shifted/Deceased): Form 7

Important: Jan 1 qualifying date, Electoral Roll revision Oct-Nov yearly

samples.instruction: Payir kadan (Crop Loan) kuraintha vattiyil eppadi vaanguvadhu? KCC endraal enna?
samples.current_output:
**Kisan Credit Card (KCC) - Crop Loan:**

**What is KCC?**
- Credit Card for farmers
- Loan for crop expenses
- Low interest
- Withdraw anytime

**Interest Rate:**
- Normal: 7%
- Central Subvention: -3%
- State Incentive: -3%
- **Effective: Only 4%!**

**Eligibility:**
- Land owning farmer
- Tenant farmer (Oral Lessee included)
- SHG/JLG members
- Fishermen, Animal husbandry

**Loan Amount:**
- Up to â‚¹3 lakh: Collateral-free
- Up to â‚¹1.6 lakh: 4% interest

**Apply:**
1. Bank directly OR
2. pmkisan.gov.in â†’ KCC tab

**Documents:**
- Aadhaar, PAN
- Land Records
- Sowing Certificate
- Photos

**Repayment:** End of crop season, timely = 4%
